doc:
Steve Gravers https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Gravers 0 Steve Gravers (born Solomon Gottlieb; April 8, 1922, New York City – died August 22, 1978, Studio City, California) was an American character actor who appeared in numerous television shows and also in several movies in a career that lasted from 1952 until his death in 1978. Steve_Gravers ( born Solomon_Gottlieb ; April_8_,_1922 , New_York_City – died August_22_,_1978 , Studio_City , California ) was an_American_character_actor who appeared in numerous_television_shows and also in several_movies in a_career that lasted from 1952 until his_death in 1978 .
